udE#namuttaqrAM naqyAgnE# GRutEnA&&huta | 
rAqyaspOShE#Naq sa(gm) sRu#ja praqjayA# caq dhanE#na ca || 
indrEqmaM pra#taqrAM kRu#dhi sajAqtAnA#-masadvaqSI | 
samE#naqM ~Mvarca#sA sRuja dEqvEByO# BAgaqdhA a#sat || 
yasya# kuqrmO haqvirgRuqhE tama#gnE vaqd^^rdhayAq tvaM | 
tasma# dEqvA adhi# bravannaqyaM caq brahma#Naqspati#H || 
udu# tvAq viSvE# dEqvA - [  ] 12
